keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

issues.brexitEurope: A referendum would enable the UK to come out and for us to leave. Some of it goes missing. Accounts that can be audited and not 'off shore' have never been accepted by the annual auditor. A business couldn't legally run this way. The EU is technically, therefore, an unaccountable organisation.
issues.governance: An MP's constituents should be kept informed of any important, unexpected developments during their MP's time in government. They should be able to trust their MP to stick to their manifesto promises and always tell the truth. This is an impossibility while we remain within the EU.

contactInformation.address: Shop under the wall.
